title: QA Consulting
desc: Leading provider of consulting services to commercial, financial organisations and government departments.

points.text: Six month rapid course on Java, Springboot, JavaScript and REACT by completeing courses as well projects.
Created a cinema webiste using the MERN stack with a fully functioning payments system as well as backend to store movies and bookings.

title: Infosys
desc: Provides software development, maintenance and independent validation services to companies in finance, insurance, manufacturing and other domains.

points.text: Founded a project/web application with other colleagues to help combat carbon emissions of websites by informing clients how much carbon footprint their website produces
Designed and developed the frontend of the web application using Next.js and REACT while trying to use sustainable design practices
Supervised interns and guided them on setting up, maintaining and developing on the frontend.
Managed multiple REACT based frontend platforms to ensure smooth user experience for both customers and brokers
Modified existing codebase by adding new functionality to help customers make clear and informed decisions regarding mortgage applications.
Delivered critical updates promptly after new products were launched that needed to be updated on the frontend so users wonâ€™t be misinformed
Built and deployed platforms to production as well helping other teams deployment and maintainence
